full_text:

Misty

> From: Rebecca <harvesthearth@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: WAV files people use WAS: My First File
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Sunday, August 3, 2008, 8:06 AM
> Misty shared:
> >Ive tried all kinds of stuff. Musical notes, snippets
> of dialogue in 
> >multiple languages, allophones, crowd noise, me saying
> "the quick
> >brown fox.." pangram worked very well. If you want

>

> file.
>
